title: Open Office Created PDF  content could not be searched
description: PDF created by Open Office 2.0.3 (latest or old), in which lucense is not searching the content or text inside it but It returns  "-1" as result. please guide us.

comments.content: Lucene knows nothing about Open Office PDFs.  It is the applications job to extract content from PDFs, Word, etc.  I suggest searching the mailing list archives for how to deal with PDFs, or look on the Lucene wiki or ask on java-user@lucene.apache.org.
comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
